review: Nice packaging.  Not compatible with every TV.  For the price works fine for SOME TVs.  However I wish that I would have spend some more for a more robust unit like the appleTV or the new Amazon Fire that work for ANY TV.The unit is wothless with my  LG TV, HDMI compatibities issues.  With my Epson (older than the TV) works fine, I just dont feel like wasting my projector's lamp's life streaming stuff from youtube plus the idea was to use it in our everyday entertainment room not a dedicated home theater.Did the latest firmware update but the problems persists. Read all over the internet and many are having the same problem and no one has found a solution.The only problem I now have is that it doesn't weight enough to use it as a paper anchor to keep paper from flying off my desk when there is a gust of wind.
